name: Aqua Revolution
description:
Aqua is a plastic bottle man who has a passion for environmental awareness. However, Aqua is racing against time to save his planet from pollution. Defeat the plastic bag men (Lil'Bag) to reduce the lag :D

This is my very first game! It took me over 2 months to create. I learnt a lot of from this game and I hope you enjoy playing it. 

If you enjoyed playing the game. I'd appreciate any donations. Which would encourage me to carry on making games. 

Thank you for the support!
